item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Starship Flight 5 [video] (873 points | 530 comments)
2. The Quiet Art of Attention (109 points | 49 comments)
3. Diffusion for World Modeling (347 points | 166 comments)
4. Innovations to Make Tibetan Language a First-Class Citizen in the Digital World (6 points | 3 comments)
5. Lessons learned from profiling an algorithm in Rust (45 points | 3 comments)
6. ClassicPress – The CMS for Creators (26 points | 10 comments)
7. Common Lisp implementation of the Forth 2012 Standard (62 points | 20 comments)
8. A Novel Channel Contention Mechanism for Improving Wi-Fi's Reliability (44 points | 13 comments)
9. Node.js, Pipes, and Disappearing Bytes (28 points | 11 comments)
10. Restic: Backups Done Right (18 points | discuss)
11. Large language models reduce public knowledge sharing on online Q&A platforms (244 points | 212 comments)
12. Ward Christensen (of BBS and XMODEM fame) has died (67 points | 9 comments)
13. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (1406 points | 382 comments)
14. DARPA Thinks Walls of Oysters Could Protect Shores Against Hurricanes (40 points | 7 comments)
15. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (467 points | 180 comments)
16. Christopher Columbus may have been Spanish and Jewish, documentary says (17 points | 2 comments)
17. Why Google Search Is Falling Apart [video] (9 points | 1 comment)
18. Can logic programming be liberated from predicates and backtracking? [pdf] (152 points | 45 comments)
19. Pepsi’s Soviet Navy (2021) (45 points | 11 comments)
20. Scientists found a way to make sound travel in only one direction (28 points | 5 comments)
21. Show HN: I've added undo and redo to IsoCity (4 points | 1 comment)
22. Eating less can lead to a longer life: study in mice shows why (177 points | 114 comments)
23. Mystery UFOs swarm US Military base (5 points | 1 comment)
24. When is causal broadcast not enough for causal memory? (6 points | discuss)
25. The Surprising Predictability of Long Runs (2012) [pdf] (32 points | 8 comments)
26. Just released: oryx now includes a powerful firewall feature (3 points | 2 comments)
27. Omni SenseVoice: High-Speed Speech Recognition with Words Timestamps (132 points | 24 comments)
28. Heart rate variability differs between smartwatch and clinical testing (87 points | 50 comments)
29. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (188 points | 18 comments)
30. Even a Single Bacterial Cell Can Sense the Seasons Changing (3 points | discuss)
